job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You won't just contribute to building our AI engine; you'll also be an integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions. By collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers, you'll bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations and bridge the gap between model development and production.

   You will:
     * Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
     * Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
     * Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
     * Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
     * Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
     * Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
     * Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

You won't just contribute to building our AI engine; you'll also be an integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions. By collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers, you'll bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations and bridge the gap between model development and production.

   You will:
     * Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
     * Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
     * Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
     * Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
     * Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
     * Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
     * Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), which are core to GenAI. While it mentions ML algorithms, the focus on these specific generative techniques and their deployment into user-facing solutions aligns more with a GenAI Engineer than a traditional ML Engineer.

phrases: Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
translate their expertise into our AI engine.
job_tasks.justification: The phrases directly relate to the creation, adaptation, and application of machine learning models, specifically mentioning LLMs and RAG, which are generative modeling techniques.

phrases: bridge the gap between model development and production.
Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to integrate ML models into larger systems and build the underlying infrastructure, which are software development activities.

phrases: integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions.
Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
job_tasks.justification: All these phrases directly describe MLOps responsibilities, including deployment, monitoring, CI/CD, and maintenance of ML models in production.

phrases: Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand the domain (medical expertise) and translate it into technical requirements for the AI engine.
Vectorial representations are a key output of data processing and feature engineering steps, often involving data engineering practices for ML models.

technologies.phrase: ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers
Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.
integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions.
